title: Shattered Horizon Nosteam: Online + SP + All Updates
description:
Shattered Horizon plot events unfold in the near future, near the moon, where there is a serious Stannaries accident, which ends in the ejection of near-Earth space a billion tons of asteroids. Surviving miners and nearby space station, astronauts find themselves in a difficult situation: all the stocks at the end, the chances of survival are close to zero, and escape, of course, everyone wants. Here you have the motivation to unleash a local conflict.
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person / Online + Local Play
Year: 2009
Developer: Futuremark Games Studio
Publisher: Futuremark Games Studio
Type of publication: License (established)

This torrent bundles the latest Shattered Horizon from steam with RevLoader and a custom launcher from Lumpi on cs.rin.ru.

The RevLoader and launcher allow for online play with cracked server. The launcher provides an option to start a cracked server.

Instructions are included in the zip. Enjoy! If you have any problems, just comment
